TextStringDefinition.TextString: Warning! Changing sex settings with running sex interactions can cause issues!\n\nEnd running sex interaction first to avoid possible problems.
Warning! Changing this sex settings can result in major problems! Make sure you really know what you're doing.
Change sex settings.\n\nThese settings affect only sex related functions like gender role recognition, positions progression, autonomy, outfit or pregnancy.
This option requires restarting the game to take full effect!\n\nSave and restart for this setting to work.
Check to allow teen age Sims to participate in sex interactions.
Check to prevent Sims from accepting sex propositions from non-preferred genders.\nUncheck to allow Sims to accept sex propositions from any gender.
Check to allow Sims to talk after finishing sex.
Check to automatically silence Sim phone during sex.
Check to display the list of animations authors when selecting sex animations.\nUncheck to display all sex animations at once.
Check to display the Animations Sorting Button on the top of the animations list.\nUncheck to display the Animations Sorting Button on the bottom of the animations list.
Change behavior of sex animations progression.
Player Sex Interaction duration related settings.
Sex interaction ends after duration in realtime minutes.
Sex interaction ends after a climax sex animation finishes.
Sex ends after a climax sex animation finishes or after duration in realtime minutes.\n(Default: 3)
Sex interaction duration in realtime minutes.\n(Default: 3)
Choose the type of sex animations progression.
Sex animations will not change on their own.
Sex animations will only change to animations that are in their stage list.
Sex animations will change according to their stage list and continue afterwards.
Sex animations will always change to a random available animation.
Set a keyboard key (4-9, A-Z) for progressing the sex interaction.\n(Default: Q)
Progression to the next sex animation category has to be allowed by the user.
Check to allow sex animations progression to continue after playing a climax animation.
Change Sims outfits behavior in sex.
Choose the type of undressing behavior Sims will follow during sex.
Choose the type of undressing behavior NPC Sims will follow during sex.
Sims in sex will not undress automatically.
Sims in sex will undress automatically according to the sex animations configuration.
Sims in sex will always undress completely.
Sims dressing up behavior after sex. Fully Check for Sims to always dress up after sex. Half Check for Sims to dress up after sex when outdoors. Uncheck for Sims to never dress up after sex.
Check to automatically undressed strapons when not needed in the currently playing animation.
Choose the type of sex initiation.
Sex will start with Sims talking and then walking to the sex location.
Sex will start instantly, teleporting Sims to the sex location.
Check to detect Height Slider mods and adjust Sims height during sex.\nUncheck to ignore Height Slider mods.
Check to allow Sims in sex to adapt to the animation roles requirements and disable automatic reassignment when swapped to opposite roles.
Check to reserve objects used for sex. Reservation prevents Sims from using the objects while they are being used for sex.
Slow Down Time During Player Sex
Check to slow down time when a player-controlled sex interaction is ongoing.
Check to have a separate Climax sex category for Climax sex animations.\nUncheck to automatically bundle Climax sex animations into other sex categories.
Override of sex animations duration in realtime seconds.
Use animations duration time defined by the author.
Override duration for all sex animations in realtime seconds.\n\nAnimations will not play exactly for the set amount out time. They will play for the approximate number of loops for the set time.
Check to display the Context pie menu category during sex.\nUncheck to not disable the Context pie menu category during sex.
Choose which options are available under the Context pie menu category during sex.
Select to display the '{0.String}' sex context option.
Check to enable Sims Sex Autonomy.
Choose an intensity preset for autonomy.\n(this alters the Autonomy Awareness settings, Autonomy Triggers settings, and Autonomy Specifics settings)
Select for minimal sex occurrences, very high Sims and Location precision, very slow cooldowns.
Select for less frequent sex, higher Sims and Location precision, slower cooldowns.
Select for default settings for Sex Autonomy.
Select for more frequent sex, higher chances, quicker cooldowns.
Select for very frequent sex, very high chances, relationships don't matter, almost no cooldowns.
All of the Sex Autonomy settings have been adjusted accordingly to the {0.String} Preset.
Choose which types of autonomy are allowed to run.
Check to allow Sims to perform random sex interactions with other Sims.
Check to allow Sims to perform random masturbation interactions.
Check to allow Sims to try to join existing sex interactions.
Check to allow Sims to perform random sex interactions when travelling to locations. Active household Sims and Sims in travel groups are not included.
Check to allow Sims to initiate sex from romantic conversations.
Check to allow Sims to perform masturbation interactions while watching sex.\n\n(requires Amra72 and ooOLaLa World animations)
Check to allow Sims to perform sex interactions when at a sex club gathering.
Check to allow Sims to invite in and perform sex interactions with peeping Sims.
Choose which elements are considered when triggering autonomy.
Check to allow Player Sims to participate in Sex Autonomy.
Check to allow Player Sims to join to existing sex interactions.
Check for Sims to stay faithful to their partner and not have sex with others.\n\nThe 'Adulterer', 'Noncommittal' and 'Player' traits on Sims ignore this setting.
Check for NPC Sims to avoid sex if they have a high chance of getting pregnant.\n(only works with Menstrual Cycle Pregnancy Mode enabled)

Check to allow the game and individual Sims to remember locations used for sex by the player and preference them in the future.\nUncheck to disallow the game and individual Sims from remembering preferenced sex locations and pick them randomly.

Check to allow the game and individual Sims to remember sex animations used by the player and preference them in the future.\nUncheck to disallow the game and individual Sims from remembering preferenced sex animations and pick them randomly.
Check for Sims to avoid attempting sex when children are on the lot.\nUncheck for Sims to attempt sex when children are on the lot.

Check for Sims to respect their own and participants gender preference when asking to join sex. (Decreases Joining Autonomy)\nUncheck for Sims to only match gender preference with any single participant when asking to join sex. (Increases Joining Autonomy)

Check for joining Sim to account for their romantic relationship with all participants when asking to join sex or when invited to join sex. (Decreases Joining Autonomy)\nUncheck for joining Sim to only account for their romantic relationship with any single participant when asking to join sex. (Increases Joining Autonomy)
Check for Sims to respect doors gender specific lock.\nUncheck for Sims to be able to walk through gender specific locked doors.
Check for Sims to assess risk of having sex by their age, number of Sims around, number of children around, and family relations.
Edit specific parts of autonomy and mess up everything.
Set a multiplier value of the random sex timer. Higher values make autonomy slower, lower values make autonomy faster.\n(Default: 1.2, Minimum: 0.01)
Set a unit interval value for chance of random solo sex occurring. Value 1.0 is 100% chance.\n(Default: 0.45, Minimum: 0.0)
Set a unit interval value for chance of random sex occurring when travelling to a location. Value 1.0 is 100% chance.\n(Default: 0.50, Minimum: 0.0)
Set a maximum number of distance units for Sims to detect sex in and consider joining it.\n(Default: 10.0, Minimum: 1.0)
Set a unit interval value for chance of random club sex occurring. Value 1.0 is 100% chance.\n(Default: 1.0, Minimum: 0.0)
Set a unit interval value for chance of random solo sex occurring from watching sex. Value 1.0 is 100% chance.\n(Default: 0.10, Minimum: 0.0)
Set a unit interval value for chance of random sex from romantic conversations occurring. Value 1.0 is 100% chance.\n(Default: 0.10, Minimum: 0.0)
Set a unit interval value for chance of random sex from positive reaction to a peeping Sim. Value 1.0 is 100% chance.\n(Default: 0.50, Minimum: 0.0)
Set a number of attempts for autonomy picking a Sims Sex Pair and Sex Location Style. Higher values decrease the failure rate.\n(Default: 5, Minimum: 1, Maximum: 120)
Set a number of Sims Sex Pairs that will be considered for autonomy. Lower values mean more precision in picking ideal sex pairs.\n(Default: 8, Minimum: 1)
Set a number of Sex Locations that will be considered for autonomy. Lower values mean more precision in picking ideal locations.\n(Default: 8, Minimum: 1)
Set a minimum number of actors that every sex interaction can be made out of by autonomy joining.\n\n(Default: 3, Minimum: 2)
Set a maximum number of actors that every sex interaction can be made out of by autonomy joining.\n\n(Default: 10, Maximum: 10)
Set a number of extra points NPC Sims Pairs gain when creating sex pairs. Sims need at least 2.15 points to create a Sex Pair.\n(Default: 1.0)
Player to NPC Sims Relationship Modifier
Set a number of extra points Player+NPC Sims Pairs gain when creating sex pairs. Sims need at least 2.15 points to create a Sex Pair.\n(Default: 0.0)
Choose and Set allowed for autonomy location styles.
Check to allow picking of sex locations outside of the lot boundaries.
Check to allow picking of sex locations outdoors within lot boundaries
Check to allow picking of risky sex locations.
Check to allow picking of comfortable sex locations.
Check to allow picking of private sex locations.
Set a multiplier value per 'Sim In Room' that increases the likeliness of the room being considered as risky.\n(Default: 2.0, Minimum: 0.0)

Set a number of extra relationship points to add to the average of an NPC Household's relationship value when considering sex while an active Sim is visiting a residential lot.\n(Default: 0, Minimum: 0)
Set cooldown timers for autonomy sex.
Set a number of minimum realtime seconds Sims wait before attempting autonomy sex again.\n(Default: 90, Minimum: 0)
Set a number of maximum realtime seconds Sims wait before attempting autonomy sex again.\n(Default: 1800, Minimum: 1)
Set a number of minimum realtime seconds Sims wait before attempting autonomy club sex again.\n(Default: 45, Minimum: 0)
Set a number of maximum realtime seconds Sims wait before attempting autonomy club sex again.\n(Default: 90, Minimum: 1)
Choose which asking sex dialogs are displayed.
Display Player Asking Player Sex Dialog
Check for Player Sims asking Player Sims for sex dialogs.
Display NPC Asking Player Sex Dialog
Check for NPC Sims asking Player Sims for sex dialogs.
Display Player Asking NPC to Join Sex Dialog
Check for Player Sims asking NPC Sims to join to sex dialogs.
Check to enable social context sex questions when Sims ask to initiate sex.\nUncheck to use a generic sex question when Sims ask to initiate sex.
Set NPC Sims sex interaction duration in realtime minutes.\n(Default: 3)
Choose the type of how Sims gender is recognized.
Select to recognize Sims gender by biological characteristics of their genitalia.
Select to recognize Sims gender by CAS 'Custom Gender Settings'.
Select to not recognize Sims gender at all.
Choose the type of Sims gender the "Both" gender will be recognized as.
Select to keep the default behavior.
Select to recognize "Both" gender as Male.
Select to recognize "Both" gender as Female.
Check to recognize female actor roles as both female and male roles (M/M).\n(allows male Sims to play female roles)
Check to recognize male actor roles as both male and female roles (F/F).\n(allow female Sims to play male roles)
Check to enable 'Gender Recognition' interactions that allow to decide about individual Sims gender role.
Check to disable restrictions for animations that require specific occult to be available.\n(Sims require an occult, like vampire, alien or ghost, to use animations with occult restrictions)
Fit Sex Animations To Sexual Function
Check to display and use sex animations that fit sexual function of Sims in sex.\nUncheck to display and use all sex animations regardless of sexual function of Sims in sex.
Check to enable Sims contracting Crabs Lice STD.
Check to enable Sims contracting Crabs Lice through infested bedding.
Set a number of population percentage that will become Crab Lice Sleeper Agents.\n(Default: 22.5%)
Check to enable cum layers showing up on Sims bodies.
Select the cum layers package to use.
Check to allow applying of cum layers when using a condom.\nUncheck to disallow applying of cum layers when using a condom.
Check to allow automatic applying of cum layers during sex.\nUncheck to disallow automatic applying of cum layers during sex and require manual usage of cum interactions.
Check to allow applying of cum layers during sex no matter the involved Sims.\nUncheck to disallow applying of cum layers when a Sim capable of producing cum is not present.
Change pregnancy settings.\n\nThese settings affect only pregnancy related functions that are the outcome of WickedWhims sex interactions.
Check to make Sims not get pregnant from sex.
Check to make Sims follow rules of their menstrual cycle for the pregnancy.\nUncheck to make Sims get pregnant based on set percentage chances
Choose percentage chance of Player Sims getting pregnant from sex.
Choose percentage chance of NPC Sims getting pregnant from sex.
Select to use Sims lifespan set in game settings.
Select for life expectancy of: Forever (21-30 days per menstrual cycle)
Select for life expectancy of: 324 days (18-24 days per menstrual cycle)
Select for life expectancy of: 162 days (13-16 days per menstrual cycle)
Select for life expectancy of: 81 days (8-10 days per menstrual cycle)
Select for life expectancy of: 42 days (6-7 days per menstrual cycle)
Choose Sims menstrual cycle fertility level.
Select for decreased menstrual cycle fertility chances.\n(0%-3%, 6%-10%, 15%-20%)
Select for realistic menstrual cycle fertility chances.\n(0%-10%, 16%-27%, 31%-33%)
Select for boosted from realistic menstrual cycle fertility chances.\n(0%-10%, 20%-31%, 43%-78%)
Select for extremely high menstrual cycle fertility chances.\n(0%-10%, 50%-80%, 90%-100%, 100%)
Select for tampons and pads to perfectly prevent any blood leaking.
Select for tampons and pads to be slightly better at preventing blood leaking.
Select for tampons and pads to have normal blood leak preventing properties.
Choose Sims automatic use of tampons behavior.
Select for Sims to not use tampons automatically.
Select for Sims to use and change tampons right before it becomes overused (every 15 hours).
Select for Sims to use and change tampons right when there is any risk of them leaking (every 8 hours).
Choose Sims automatic use of pads behavior.
Select for Sims to not use pads automatically.
Select for Sims to use and change pads right before it becomes overused (every 16 hours).
Select for Sims to use and change pads right when there is any risk of them leaking (every 6 hours).
Advanced settings for the menstrual cycle.
Use Toilet to Change Pad/Tampon Switch
Check to make Sims use a nearby toilet when changing their pad/tampon.\nUncheck to make changing pads/tampons immediate.
Check to allow PMS/Period effect moodlets to show up on Sims.\n(Effect Moodlets like mood swings, cramps, etc.)
Check to allow Sims to menstrual bleed during their period.
Check to make Sims auto remove their pad when undressing outfit bottom.\nUncheck to make Sims keep their pad with undressed outfit bottom.
Check to allow NPC Sims get pregnant on their own from sex.
Check to make birth control pills prevent Sim PMS and Period.
Select to make every birth control method prevent pregnancy with 100% success rate.
Select to make every birth control method be unreliable at preventing pregnancy.
Select to make every birth control method have a realistic chance of failing to prevent pregnancy.
NPC Sims Birth Control Use Behavior
Change NPC Sims use of birth control behavior.
Select to make most of NPC Sims own and use birth control.
Select to make some of NPC Sims own and use birth control.
Select to make NPC Sims rarely own and use birth control.
Select to make NPC Sims not own birth control unless given by the player.
Check to make Sims use condoms automatically during pregnancy sex.
Check to make Sims use birth control pills automatically once a day.
Condom Auto Remove for Non-Pregnancy Sex
Check to automatically remove condoms from Sims during sex that cannot cause pregnancy.\nUncheck to keep Sims condoms on during any sex.
Native pregnancy duration in Sim days.\n(Default: 3, Minimum: 1)
Check to allow Sims to experience miscarriage.
Check to allow unborn offspring to be added to the family tree.
Check to display extra pregnancy notifications.
Check to allow WickedWhims pregnancy functionality override WooHoo and Try For Baby interactions behavior.\nUncheck to keep WooHoo and Try For Baby interactions behavior unaltered by WickedWhims.
Check to transform all WooHoo interactions to allow pregnancy and disable all Try for Baby interactions.\nUncheck to keep all WooHoo interactions unchanged and enable Try for Baby interactions.
Change all of the unrelated settings.
Check to allow non-sex interactions to be available during sex.\nUncheck to disallow non-sex interactions from being available during sex.
Check to allow default 'WooHoo' and 'Try for Baby' interactions.\n\n(requires to restart the game)

Sims will always accept sex propositions. Fully Check for Sims to always accept no matter the circumstances. Half Check for Sims to always accept except for gender preference incompatibility, cheating, or fear of pregnancy. Uncheck for Sims to not always accept.

Uncheck to prevent Sims Needs/Motives from decaying during sex.
Uncheck to prevent Sims relationship changing from sex.
Uncheck to prevent Sims from avoiding seeing sex.
Uncheck to prevent Sims from reacting to sex.
Uncheck to prevent Sims from reacting to cum on other Sims bodies.
Uncheck to prevent parent Sims from reacting to teen Sims pregnancy.

As one begins their journey through the fields of Sim sexuality, they begin to see the subtle connections between each aspect of intimacy. The more time spent developing this skill, the more one is able to understand and adapt to their partner's sexual desires as well as furthering their proficiency at reading their signs.\n\nSexpertise skill is improved by analyzing the intricacies of Sim sexology via books, or more personal 'research'.

{0.SimFirstName} has just begun {M0.his}{F0.her} passage into the world of carnal knowledge. As {M0.he}{F0.she} delves deeper inside the rabbit hole, {M0.he}{F0.she} will discover more intimate secrets along the way.
{0.SimFirstName}'s knowledge in lovemaking grows rapidly, making satisfying other Sims' desires a piece of cake...
After hours spent gaining sexual experience {0.SimFirstName} is becoming more and more knowledgeable in the ability to please others sexually, making {M0.him}{F0.her} a better lover.

Almost there! {0.SimFirstName}'s sexual horizons have expanded, making {M0.him}{F0.her} even more adept at all things intimate. Other Sims won't easily forget any sexual adventures they embark on together with {0.SimFirstName}.

{0.SimFirstName} has reached sex mastery. {M0.He}{F0.She} is now able to notice and decipher the most elusive signs of the body language of {M0.his}{F0.her} partner and act accordingly, making each sexual encounter with {0.SimFirstName} almost a guaranteed good time.
Sexpertise Vol 1: The Love Makers Guide to the Intercourse

By: Bryan Creamer\n\nJoin the famous sex star Bryan Creamer as he cautiously and respectfully welcomes you to the adult world of lust, and very inappropriate desires in this acclaimed over 300-page bestseller, which has been used by Sims worldwide as both entertainment and basic 'A to Z' in sex for years.
Sexpertise Vol 2: Choose your own Sex Venture

By: Sex Gurus\n\nThis nifty book has everything a contemporary, sexually active Sim might need in their intimate life. We've asked sex gurus to share their life experiences and help the reader find a suitable sexual partner, as well as point out most of the red flags you should avoid while looking for a potential mate. All that and more to make sure everyone walks out of every intimate encounter satisfied and without regrets.

By: Sonny Jeans\n\nTraining gloves come off in this professional lovemaking guide. This book is directed at Sims who know what they're doing, what they're looking for, and are comfortable with themselves physically, mentally and - of course - sexually. Everything you need to know about giving and receiving sexual pleasure is contained within these over 400 pages of pure unadulterated knowledge.
{0.SimFirstName}'s Sexpertise skill is not on an appropriate level to read this book.

{0.SimFirstName} asked someone to have sex with {M0.him}{F0.her} but it didn't go so well.
{0.SimFirstName} was asked if {M0.he}{F0.she} wants to have sex but that conversation was downright distasteful.
Can I join in on the fun?
Do you want to join in on the fun?
No, I don't want to join in.
Is sleeping with the enemy supposed to be a bad thing? Would you like to find out for yourself?
Maybe then I won't hate you so much.
I have always wondered that. We might as well!
I didn't think I could hate you more, but I do now!
I am too preoccupied to consider this right now.
Sometimes I really can't stand the sight of you but right now all I want to do is get down and dirty.\nWhat about you? What would you say to a romp in the hay?
I hate you too but I feel the same. Let's do it.
I don't think you realize just how much I hate you.
What makes you think I'd ever agree to that?
When I see you I see only trash! But sometimes you just NEED some junk food. Know what I mean?
You're definitely not good for me. Let's do it!
Instead of ruining my day with your presence why don't you put that loose tongue of yours to good use for once, bend down and see how fast you can make me scream?
I would rather lick a dead fish.
I won't degrade myself by bending down for you.
I hate you so much, but I also want to bang the hell out of you.
I get exactly what you mean. Let's act on that feeling.
You are being extremely weird. Leave me alone.
Have you ever heard of hate sex? I did, and I heard it can be one of the most memorable experiences in one's life.
No, and I don't care to try it!
Did you know that hate and lust are two sides of the same coin? Or was it love? I think it was lust.
It was definitely love, and I don't have any for you.
You really are desperate aren't you?
What's gotten into you? Leave me alone.
I honestly can't look at your face but we can always have sex with our eyes closed.
Ok, first of all, rude. But let's do it anyway.
No, even if I had my eyes gouged out.
I'm don't feel like even joking about that stuff.
I know we're not on good terms, so do you wanna have sex and make up?
It's about time to bury the hatchet.
We're not on good terms for a reason, dickhead.
I don't wanna talk to you.
Let's make up first, talk sex later, ok?
You're disgusting. I will NEVER have sex with you.
I'm not saying no, but I'm also not saying yes.
I don't know if we're ever going to be great friends, but we can at least have some great sex.
Great sex? With you? What a joke.
We can still be friends you know? But don't force it.
We don't know each other, but would you like to have some fun with me?
You know what? Let's see how much fun we can have!
I'm not interested in any kind fun with strangers.
Ugh, you sound so pathetic and desperate. No way!
Um...that's creepy. Why would you even ask that?
Hey there, I know we haven't spoken before, but as soon as I saw you I instantly felt a connection. What's say we take the plunge and have some fun?
Sure! There's no better way to get to know someone.
I'd rather with anyone else but you.
You're right, I don't know you so please go away.

Why excuse me {M1.Sir}{F1.Madam}, but I couldn't help but lose myself in your {M1.devilishly handsome aura}{F1.angelic beauty}.\nWe may not know one another but I have this deep hungering desire to discover as much as I can through the carnal act of skinship.
Indeed, let us intimately explore each other's bodies.
You're probably the biggest creep I've met in a while.
I'm sorry but would you kindly... go away?
That's not even a pick-up line but fine, LET'S DO THIS!
Does that ever actually work on people?
Hey there {M1.handsome}{F1.cutie}, wanna have some fun with a fun {M0.guy}{F0.girl} such as myself?
Did it hurt when you fell from heaven? I can give you a nice butt massage.
Yeah, my butt's been killing me actually.
I actually crawled up from hell, it was pretty easy.
No, but when I do need a massage I will call you!
Do you wanna leave here on a stretcher? Creep...
You look like you're fun in bed. Are you fun?
Oh, I can be very fun... Can you handle it?
Nah, I'm very boring. I only use my bed to sleep in it.
I love your legs, but I think they would look better spread out.
I'm sure you will love what's between them.
And you would look better if you were walking away!
I've heard my face is quite comfortable, wanna sit on it?
I did hear I make an excellent sitter.
Did you honestly think that would work?
I'm gonna pretend I didn't hear that.
Hey {1.SimFirstName}, I know we don't know each other that well but I think would be really good in the sack. I think we should skip the formalities and just go for it!
Alright, let's go for it. Screw the Formalities!
What? No! Gross! Get away from me.
I don't really know you enough to see you like that.
I know we don't know each other that well, but... would you like to have sex with me?
I thought you would never ask!
You're direct, I like that, but now is not the time.
You know what? I've had you on my dirty mind since I met you.
Funny, you haven't left my mind either!
Better cleanse that mind cause that's not happening.
We barely know each other, maybe one day...
What makes you think it's okay to say that?
Is that a gnome in your pocket or are you just happy to see me?
I'm less happy to see you now that you've said that.
How would one even fit a gnome into their pocket?
Did you really just say that?
You give off vibes that make me feel we're sexually compatible. Wanna test that?
Guess there's only one way to test it!
And you give off creep vibes. No thanks.
I'm not vibing with that idea right now.
Would you like to take part in a mating ritual involving at least you and me?
You do look like a suitable mate. Let's do it!
Mating with you doesn't seem beneficial, so no.
It's not mating season just yet.
There is a possibility of more people? Sign me in!
Hey, you want to get lucky with me?
Well lucky you, because I do!
That sounds like bad luck though.
Not in a mood, but try your luck again sometime!
I think we should skip the 'getting to know each other' part, and just have sex. Preferably right now.
Oh, I don't even wanna get to know you, creep!
But I actually like that part...
We should get to know each other better. Physically.
Agreed. Best way of strengthening a relation.
I'd like to get to know you as a person first.
I'm from the future. We need to have sex right now or the space-time continuum will collapse!
Oh no! Not the space-time continuum! Quickly!
You're not from the future. You're full of crap.
Heard that one before. You might wanna redo.
My horoscope told me I am going to have sex this week... so I thought I would ask.
Well if the horoscope says so... can't fight fate!

This message is meant to inform you about the possibility of adjusting settings related to Pregnancy Modes.

A Sim in your household is about have their first period. This will happen to other Sims in the world, depending on your settings.
You can change how and in what way, if at all, Sims will experience their Menstrual Cycle. Use the button below to decide about your preferred Pregnancy configuration.

If you already adjusted your Pregnancy settings you can safely ignore this message.

<font color='#EC262E'>No Sex Permitted On Lot</font> (Autonomy Sign)

The <font color='#EC262E'>No Sex Permitted On Lot</font> sign prevents all Sims from attempting to have sex on the lot. This sign can be placed anywhere on the lot to take effect.\n\nThe <font color='#3AAF69'>Sex Permitted In Room</font> sign overrides the effect of this sign for the room it is placed in. Making sex allowed only in that room.
**INVISIBLE** <font color='#EC262E'>No Sex Permitted On Lot</font> (Autonomy Sign)

The <font color='#EC262E'>No Sex Permitted On Lot</font> sign prevents all Sims from attempting to have sex on the lot. This sign can be placed anywhere on the lot to take effect. It will disappear when in Live Mode.\n\nThe <font color='#3AAF69'>Sex Permitted In Room</font> sign overrides the effect of this sign for the room it is placed in. Making sex allowed only in that room.
<font color='#EC262E'>No Sex Permitted In Room</font> (Autonomy Sign)

The <font color='#EC262E'>No Sex Permitted In Room</font> sign prevents all Sims in a room with this sign from attempting to have sex. This sign has to be placed within a room to take effect, and it only affects Sims within that room.
**INVISIBLE** <font color='#EC262E'>No Sex Permitted In Room</font> (Autonomy Sign)

The <font color='#EC262E'>No Sex Permitted In Room</font> sign prevents all Sims in a room with this sign from attempting to have sex. This sign has to be placed within a room to take effect, and it only affects Sims within that room. It will disappear when in Live Mode.

The <font color='#3AAF69'>Sex Permitted In Room</font> sign overrides the <font color='#EC262E'>No Sex Permitted On Lot</font> sign for the room it is placed in. Making sex allowed only in that room.
